overview: When you just can't resist asking that pretty stranger next to you if you can squeeze her tits, that's a BIG RACK ATTACK! Don't panic though... This weakness for whoppers is common and you're not alone. If you're like us, you love to suck, fuck, and squeeze big balloons, huge hand-warmers, massive milk cans, jiggly jumbos, lovely lactoids, fleshy funbags, perky pokers, plump pillows, and bouncy bra busters. Resist the uncontrollable urge to grab girls in public and push play on this DVD instead! 28 pussies, 56 perfect pairs, and enough tit-tugging to satisfy any cannon connoisseur!
tagline: 28 Girls Rackin' Up 20 Scenes Plus 1 Brand New Scene!
title: Big Rack Attack 2
